'''True Tales of the Violet Garden''' is an Event Chapter during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] event.

Requirements: {{Quest|30;Ritou Escape Plan|display=fullSentence|requirements=1}}

Recommended Quests: {{Quest|The Firmiana Leaf Falls;Transient Dreams;Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Legends of the Kasen==
===List of Acts===
* Act I - [[The Strange Tale of Suikou's Tipsy Tincture]]
* Act II - [[What the Blue Flowers Left Behind]]
* Act III - [[A New Painting in Pale Scarlet]]
* Act IV - [[The Palace, Dyed in Black]]

===Summary===
====Act I - The Strange Tale of Suikou's Tipsy Tincture====
{{Main|The Strange Tale of Suikou's Tipsy Tincture}}
{{Description|The Inazuma [[Adventurers' Guild]] has assigned you &mdash; yes, you &mdash; a specific commission. The curtain is about to rise on a most unique [[Irodori Festival]]!}}
{{Transclude|The Strange Tale of Suikou's Tipsy Tincture|Summary}}

====Act II - What the Blue Flowers Left Behind====
{{Main|What the Blue Flowers Left Behind}}
{{Description|[[Xingqiu]], the author of "A Legend of Sword" is about to arrive in Inazuma. Should you conceal the previous loss of the books from him?}}
{{Transclude|What the Blue Flowers Left Behind|Summary}}

====Act III - A New Painting in Pale Scarlet====
{{Main|A New Painting in Pale Scarlet}}
{{Description|A cargo ship arriving in [[Ritou]] brings with it a friend you haven't met in a while. The mysterious poetic manuscript is also taking the story into unknown waters...}}
{{Transclude|A New Painting in Pale Scarlet|Summary}}

====Act IV - The Palace, Dyed in Black====
{{Main|The Palace, Dyed in Black}}
{{Description|What truths will [[Kazuha]] bring when he returns from his investigation? The long-hidden secret is about to be revealed...}}
{{Transclude|The Palace, Dyed in Black|Summary}}
